name: Final Project (Haytham Nikolaidis)
description:
Thank you for playing Street Beats.

This is my Final Year project, for my BSc Computer Science Degree, through the University of London.

Neon Future City is held together by electricity. Don't skip a beat or Neon Future City might not survive.

How to play: 

  1. Choose a difficulty and song.
  2. Wait for the song to start.
  3. This game supports a keyboard and most gamepads.
    1. On the keyboard, the inputs are "Q", "W", "E" and "R".
    2. On gamepad it's the buttons.
  4. (Optional) Go to settings to rebind the keys you would like to use on the keyboard or gamepad. 
  5. Press the correct button at the correct time.
    1. The orb will disappear if you press the button at the correct time.
    2. It will continue to travel off-screen if you don't.
  6. Have fun!
  7. Once you have played a bit, please fill in this form. If you spot a bug you can use this form to let me know! https://forms.gle/ajNXkyGCjK6EZvAw6
